titleStmt.title: A papist not misrepresented by Protestants being a reply to the Reflections upon the Answer to (A papist misrepresented and represented.)
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Sherlock. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
The Reflections upon the Answer is by J. Gother.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
